MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://pad.asp-software.org

English.Keywords: winLAME encoder audio format MP3 Opus Ogg Vorbis CD track ripping ID3 tag ID3v2 CoverArt Album Art
English.Char_Desc_45: winLAME is an easy to use encoder for MP3
English.Char_Desc_80: winLAME is an easy to use encoder for many audio formats, including MP3 and more
English.Char_Desc_250: winLAME is an easy to use encoder for many audio formats, including MP3, Opus, Ogg Vorbis and more. winLAME lets you read in audio tracks from CDs or encode audio files from your hard drive.
English.Char_Desc_450:
winLAME is an easy to use encoder for many audio formats, including MP3, Opus, Ogg Vorbis and more.
winLAME lets you read in audio tracks from CDs or encode audio files from your hard drive. The intuitive wizard-style user interface makes it easy to set up encoding settings. Multicore CPUs are used to parallelize encoding tasks.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
winLAME is an easy to use encoder for many audio formats, including MP3, Opus, Ogg Vorbis and more.
winLAME lets you read in audio tracks from CDs or encode audio files from your hard drive. The intuitive wizard-style user interface makes it easy to set up encoding settings. Multicore CPUs are used to parallelize encoding tasks.

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: winLAME is distributed and licensed under the GNU General Public License (GPL). See http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html for more information.
Permissions.EULA: Please note that personal and/or commercial use of compiled versions of LAME, the mp3 encoder library contained in winLAME, may require a patent license in some countries. Check before using winLAME!
